Class Type1CharString

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fontbox.cff.Type1CharString
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Type2CharString

    public class Type1CharString
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents and renders a Type 1 CharString.
